website_summaries.verdict: A remarkably affordable option, this tumbling mat can also be used for gymnastics and exercising.
pros: Option to purchase in many different colors
Able to fold into carrying mat with handle
Able to connect to other mats for those needing a larger work area
cons: Thinner and shorter than many customers anticipated

customer_reviews.title: Quality Mats, Great Price
customer_reviews.text: I DON"T WRITE REVIEWS, ever - but the quality of these mats has compelled me to do so. The pictures don't do them justice - they feel professional grade and my children love them (we bought 2). The foam is solid yet bouncy and the canvas is strong without being abrasive to their skin. The handles are NOT in between the pads they are on the ends. If you are looking for a high quality mat this one is great and reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua K

customer_reviews.title: Great product, a little slick but good quality.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product, exactly what I was looking for. Have a 7year old that started gymnastics and needs it for help with a back bend kick over she's been working on. They leave the mat folded and as the child gets better unfolds the mat one layer at a time til the child can do it in the ground. The only thing I will say is when she's barefoot she slips on the mat while doing the back bend .... so we will be looking for no skid socks ....other than that it's great. And I expected it would be a little slick so no worries
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: This is not an 8×4. It is 7 ft 7in by 3 ft 9in. The underneth of the mat is a cheep material. We are trying to return it. The blue mat in the pictures is an 8 by 4. So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.text: My 7 years old daughter is crazy about gymnastics and I was looking for something she could have in her room to practice when need it but you could put away when not. This has worked like a charm. I see another reviews complaining about quality, I have to tell for the price it's perfect. You will not find a professional mat for less than 200 dollars and this one is as good. It's not to thick but keeps my little one safe from get injured.
customer_reviews.author: EVA SUAREZ

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price
customer_reviews.text: Overall, these seem to be decent mats for the $70 price tag. I ordered five of these to line my basement walls to provide a softer surface as the basement is the kids play area. One of the seems was fraying upon arrival but not to the point of being a big deal for the use I bought them for. The colors are nice and bright and they are easy to handle. They are smaller than 4x8x2 though and the seller should note the actual dimensions, somewhere around 93" long.
customer_reviews.author: John Public

customer_reviews.title: Glad I chose this one!
customer_reviews.text: Durable and just the right amount of give (not much at all). Although I’m really glad I chose this one, there is about a half inch gap between 2 of the sections near the perimeter, almost as if it wasn’t lined up exactly right. But my 4 year old isn’t doing back handsprings or anything so the risk of finger injury is non-existent. And even if she were, the gap isn’t anywhere close to where hands would be landing.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica D R

customer_reviews.title: Happy girl
customer_reviews.text: There were some slight imperfections (cuts/rips/tears) when it arrived but they seemed very small. I'm going to keep an eye on then to make sure they don't get bigger. I did not contact the company because they may be nothing to worry about. I will say this may is super thick. I guess I wasn't thinking about how thick a 2 inch mat would be, but i'm very happy with how soft it is. Makes me feel much better with my daughter doing her flips and other gymnastic stuff on it!
customer_reviews.author: Kelli Schroeder

customer_reviews.title: Bad Product, Bad Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mat for my daughters for Christmas 2019. Fast forward about 6 months later and this mat completely fell apart. It gets light use from three children 10 and under. As you can see, this is a safety hazard for children to continue using. I contacted the seller who instead of standing behind their product, gave a very short answer of it was past the 90 day warranty so they couldn't return, exchange or replace the item and have a good day. I love Amazon because most of the sellers will stand behind their product. Not the case here. Do NOT buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: StacieLynn

customer_reviews.title: This is great for my 5 year old who loves to tumble
customer_reviews.text: This is great for my 5 year old who loves to tumble! functional and padded enough to help prevent injury's. this mat seems like it is great quality and will last us a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight but not durable
customer_reviews.text: Got this mat for my kids for Christmas and it’s already falling apart and torn sadly... I have no idea how bc my kids rarely play on it and we don’t move it around since it is set up in our home gym. Needless to say, I am disappointed in the overall quality and the strength of the seams holding it together. On the positive, it is lightweight and does fold up easily plus it is very cushioned and not too hard. I just wish it was made more durable so it would last more than a month
customer_reviews.author: Heather Metz

customer_reviews.title: TOXIC POISON SMELL VERY BAD FOR MYSELF AND MY KIDS!!!
customer_reviews.text: VOC LEVELS HIGH IN HOME, THESE MATS WERE UNDER AC RETURN DRAWING IN THIS TOXIC PRODUCT SMELL, WE WERE SUFFERING BREATHING THIS STUFF IN NOT KNOWING THE ISSUES IT WAS CAUSING US. SO I CALL AMAZON AND BOTTOM LINE I GET AN EMAIL FROM THIS COMPANY THAT SAYS CASE CLOSED AND CANNOT RETURN BECAUSE OUTSIDE OF RETURN WINDOW! WE WOULD HAVE NEVER PURCHASED IF WE KNEW THESE HAD THAT TOXIC SMELL ISSUE! AND ITS NOT SOMETHING YOU REALIZE IMMEDIATELY. I BELIEVE PRODUCT LIKE THIS SHOULDNT BE ALLOWED ON AMAZON.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great matt for my granddaughter and her tumbling, jumping and indoor use
customer_reviews.text: we live in a up stairs condo, and my 6 yr old granddaughter likes to run, jump, skip, and do all the things little girls do. I put this matt down and you don't hear the pounding at all, she jump ropes, and tumbles without a sound, the downstairs neighbors don't hear a thing, I have asked... its a good quality pad thick and sturdy great deal and price
customer_reviews.author: rambodave

customer_reviews.title: Mat
customer_reviews.text: This mat is wonderful. It is so light and easy to move around. It is thick and it is durable. It is so sturdy and it works for all my gymnastics needs. The only issue I have is that it off-gases a pretty bad smell. I have had it outside for weeks and it still smells. I am hoping that the smell will go away soon because I want to bring it back inside to use more frequently.
customer_reviews.author: Rose Katz

customer_reviews.title: Protection
customer_reviews.text: We are using these as crash pads in my son's room. He is six with severe autism and bangs his head on the wall. Sometimes it's hard enough to leave a hole! We screwed them to the wall through the velcro strips. They've been up for two days and he's been hanging away on them and pulling at them. No rips or tears and i dont worry about him hurting himself.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Goad

customer_reviews.title: Horrible product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter who is responsible with her stuff and takes care of her stuff really well. After a week of doing flips and cartwheels and other things on it we had to duck tape it back together. Then we went to look into the warranty and they want us to pay for shipping and we have to pay to fix the mat. Even though they said it was covered by the company.
customer_reviews.author: Stotler

customer_reviews.title: Depends on your purpose of use, but good enough for our intentions
customer_reviews.text: Great for my baby's play area, yet the thickness of the material may easily tear if their is vigorous gymnastic tumbling in it. If you twist/spin your bare foot, your foot will grip the material and you will not freely turn. I am leery about wearing any footwear, because the vinyl material feels so thin. Holding up so far. Purchased 3 total and they connect very well with the velcro strips.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Love this mat!
customer_reviews.text: We love this mat! We use it at our dance studio and have had no problems with it. It cleans up well and we haven't had any problems with it. I am actually going to buy another one for more length. I was wary since it was cheap but I am so glad I went with it!
customer_reviews.author: Abigail Langston

customer_reviews.title: Tear between mats within a week
customer_reviews.text: I was beyond impressed on first inspection of this product, BUT there was a small tear in one of the seams which turned into a large tear within less than a week of light use. I wanted to love this mat, but now we're stuck with the inconvenience of returning for a refund after owning it for only a week. If the seams had held up, this would have been exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: J. N. Horn

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t stay closed when standing for storage, but otherwise perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: I gave 4 stars I stead of 5 because it doesn’t have a way to secure once folded. It easily falls open. I wish it had Velcro or a strap to keep it folded up. Other than that - super think, easy to move and lift. Seems durable. My daughter loves it!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for dance at home
customer_reviews.text: Both my daughters are in dance classes and our hard floors are tough on little knees and feet. This mat has been perfect for dancing and acro classes at home. It is thick, folds up easily, and has been perfect so far.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Great mat for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Mat is perfect. Very sturdy and no signs up tearing or wear of any sort after several months of use. Easy to fold up when not in use. Definitely recommend! I searched all over Amazon and went to Ikea to check out their mats (which are much smaller and still sell for $35), and was appalled by the thin, cheap mat. The cheapo options out there are junk, but this mat is a true bargain for the money!
customer_reviews.author: J.D.

customer_reviews.title: great, (I also use them as standing desk mat)
customer_reviews.text: lots of fun for the kids to play, I use for short work outs (the seams split too easily thought, making it hard for me to do push up.) . i also use it as a standing desk mat, I think it feels much better than the smaller dedicated mats, this one i can literally walk around and come back to work.)
customer_reviews.author: JZ

customer_reviews.title: Lumpy foam panels
customer_reviews.text: Very poor quality mat. I gave it two stars because it arrived quickly and was the correct item ordered. The mat has irregular randomly placed large lumps on each of the foam panels making it a very undesirable surface for any use where you would want a flat, level, or even surface. I have been very disappointed in the quality and would not recommend this mat to anyone. It dors not even fold together all of the way do tothe lumps. I feel taken advantage of that I trusted that I would receive the product with a minimum quality standard that was not met.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great tumbling pads
customer_reviews.text: Much higher quality than I expected for the price. Very durable. Bought a couple for my 6 year old. But when they are attached together they are durable and padded enough to wrestle with my teen boys.
customer_reviews.author: mently

customer_reviews.title: So fun
customer_reviews.text: This has provided so much fun for the kids in the backyard running and flipping, backbends, even jumping on the colors and someone guessing which color you are on. One end of the carrying straps came off, but I can sew that back on I think easily.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: We love it!
customer_reviews.text: This has to be the best mat ever! It's thick, the colors are vibrant, and it is well crafted. My 7 yr old plays with it everyday. Thankful for this mat bc she can't get outside much during the winter months so this helps keep her active.
customer_reviews.author: A Nu Redd

customer_reviews.title: Super nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Super nice quality. Colors are not obnoxious. They won't last 1000 years but for our gentle use the mat is great. We have two and it has velcro that sticks them together well. Packs away nicely because it folds and then has a handle. We have had other ones that don't pack away nicely at all, and since returned them.
customer_reviews.author: CleanDean

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Love this mat for my little girl to practice gymnastics and for myself for exercising and yoga. Lightweight, has handles to move from room to room, velcro on bottom all the way around to keep in place. The sizing is great because you can “stack” two and lay the other two flat to practice back bends and use it for exercise purpose. Durable and worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Anita W.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed, falls apart
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with how fast this mat has fallen apart. It’s a soft mat and fold us easily for my 7 year old to do on her own. In between the sections after being used a couple times a week for 4 months the mat is starting to come apart. Would recommend finding a mat elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: D. Stone

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money
customer_reviews.text: We already had 3 of these, and added a 4th one this month. The other mats are still going strong after almost 3 years of hard use. Glad to recommend these for anyone looking for quality mats.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Great mat!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 5 year old daughter to practice her gymnastics at home. This mat is great. Not to hard and not to soft. The handles for carrying it are a bonus. Very happy with this purchase. And very affordable compared to most good quality mats.
customer_reviews.author: Acswan

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, large size
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mat for my son to play on. We have hard floors, and since he is just starting to stand, he still falls a lot. The size was actually a bit bigger than I realized it would be, but that’s not a complaint. The quality seems good so far, and it folds easily for when we want to put it up out of the way. There is a handle on it, so moving it is quite easy.
customer_reviews.author: JBeanz324

customer_reviews.title: Serves its purpose
customer_reviews.text: I have a smaller mat that is better quality. I should have ordered that brand again. This mat is fine. Really! But I was hoping for GREAT...not fine. That said, it is fine! It's just not as good as the other one.
customer_reviews.author: BellevueMom

customer_reviews.title: Nice functional mat
customer_reviews.text: Thickness is great. Velcro is a good feature. My 9 yr old has enough space on mat to do gymnastics. Good quality. Toys and other objects should be kept off for sure as the mat material could be scratched or cut easily.
customer_reviews.author: HMS

customer_reviews.title: Ripped apart after 3 months.  Don't waste the money.
customer_reviews.text: Looks like a great quality mat, but after 3 months of average use (not everyday) by a 4 year old and 6 year old the seams tore apart. Right after the 90 day warranty expired. I emailed the company Cavalier Store and they would not refund or replace the mat. Disappointed. This was their reply: I do apologize, but the 90-day warranty for your item is expired at this time. For this reason, we cannot accept a return, ship a replacement, or issue a refund. Kind Regards, Avery
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Wargo

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy - not the mat you get in the photo
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this thinking I was getting a nice mat with the black bottom and velcro sides. It's not that. This mat slides very easily and ripped after one day on the seam. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: J. Ford

customer_reviews.title: Super worth it!
customer_reviews.text: This mat is so comfy to relax and practice on and is the perfect size for my home studio. It folds up to a nice little seated position too! I fell asleep on it on accident the first day I got it, because it is so nice! It does slide, so I recommend getting something that grips the floor to put underneath it unless you have carpet. I have wood floors...
customer_reviews.author: Shaunte' Branham

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a 3/4 year old
customer_reviews.text: The toddler loves it! She is three. It is perfect for her to practice her little tricks. Eventually we will need to buy a bigger one, but this is great for now.
customer_reviews.author: cfull13

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely a great value for the money. This mat is a very decent size and it has just enough firmness and padding to it to do the job. I am very satisfied with my purchase and would most certainly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: It's exactly how I wanted it to be. Sturdy & also comfortable for kids. My older one is able to practice his gymnastics well on it & my younger one just has fun on it. The best part is its easily foldable and can be stored away & my kids do it themselves. I am quite happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Pamper

customer_reviews.title: Late shipping
customer_reviews.text: Product is great but shipping was terrible. They didn’t ship it until the day they originally said it would be delivered, which was 10 days after I bought it. This was a gift and it was late.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Wilkes Photography

customer_reviews.title: Already splitting and less than 2 weeks old!
customer_reviews.text: My gymnasts were excited to receive this but it is less than 2 weeks old and already splitting at the middle seem. We are going to attempt to patch with some duct tape but next time I might try for a different brand. It does fold easily and has been great for indoor stretching and tumbling.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Damaged during shipping
customer_reviews.text: The mat seems very nice, good quality. We just got it, so I don't know how it will hold up against the wear and tear of kids. The only problem that I have is that it was damaged during shipping. Something punctured through the box and into the mat. I am concerned that the relatively small hole get large very quickly as soon as we start to use it. Return shipping is quite expensive and so it seems that we will be sticking with a damaged product.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunate this product should be recalled.
customer_reviews.text: This product was such a disappointment. My ten-year-old daughter used it for one week and it ripped. There should be a recall on this product.
customer_reviews.author: Shena

customer_reviews.title: I think that this mat is amazing I bought this mat for my leave 3 daughter ...
customer_reviews.text: I think that this mat is amazing I bought this mat for my leave 3 daughter she loves the mat the only thing I'm concerned about is that it slides on wood floors so if you have no carpet then I wouldn't recommend buying it. But if you have carpet then I would recommend buying it. my daughter loves it so much she can do her skills on it, but when she did a back-walk-over on it on the wood floors the mat slide, but when she did it on the carpet she did not slip. This mat seems easy to carry it because my daughter cared it down are stars easily.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Conway

customer_reviews.title: Great Exercise Mat
customer_reviews.text: Great mat for home gym floor exercises. Not to cushy but yet cushy enough. Easy to wipe down and store. I feel this was a great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Laura K

customer_reviews.title: Great mat
customer_reviews.text: We’ve had this mat for several years now. We bought it help our infant daughter with physical therapy. It has withstood a toddler and a dog and continues to be enjoyed.
customer_reviews.author: lyork0814

customer_reviews.title: Nice mat
customer_reviews.text: We got this mat for the kids and put it in the basement (under a hammock swing that seems a bit dangerous to me!) It will help protect them and provide a nice tumbling mat as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda McLean

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves her mat. It’s easy to fold up and transport. Whether cart wheeling outside or across the living room. Plus it makes a nice comfy spot the lay on when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Gavin Post

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Great mat! Thick and great size! Great company! Order at last minute and they were nice enough to get it to me before Christmas! Thank you to the company for sending via Fed Ex!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Money's worth
customer_reviews.text: It's a tumble mat. It does what a tumble mat does. I wish tumble mats were a little bit cheaper, but they all cost about this much and this one is really good quality at that price point.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Good sturdy exercise mat
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for about 16 months now. Love it. Is the elephant in the room so it gets noticed and used a lot. Have used it at least 3 times per week - daily for the last few months. Get the 4x8’ size. You will appreciate the bigger size. I bought the multi-color one because it was cheaper. Makes it easier to rotate use of each end. Holding up very well.
customer_reviews.author: KennB

customer_reviews.title: NOT durable!
customer_reviews.text: Using for home online Karate class during quarantine. Have used 3-4 times and the seams are already ripping. For the price I would have figured these would be of better quality and durability. Disappointing that my daughter now has brand new mats covered in duct tape already.
customer_reviews.author: J. Webster

customer_reviews.title: An Excellent Choice
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the quality of this product. Sturdy, durable, colorful and convenient to use and to store. Our 8 year old twins who wrestle and do acro were thrilled and used it immediately.
customer_reviews.author: carol w moriarty

customer_reviews.title: Mostly Great!
customer_reviews.text: This mat is a little harder than we thought (when she lands on her back it can take the wind out of her), but overall its a great bargain! My daughter is on pre team and does tricks non-stop in the house and i love that she can take this thing out herself when she is ready to play. We generally do have to fold it back up, but its surprisingly light. I guess the only thing we wish we could change is that the surface be slightly softer for landings.
customer_reviews.author: BeachMom

customer_reviews.title: Easy to fold up
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this mat. She has used it every single day since we bought it. Great purchase if you have a little gymnast running around the house.
customer_reviews.author: R. Hobbs

customer_reviews.title: Nice cushion
customer_reviews.text: Works well and easy to fold up for storage. One drawback is that it smells a bit even after a few weeks since we got it.
customer_reviews.author: Tools. Electro. DIY

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a playroom
customer_reviews.text: I’m very happy with the product. Just got it out and cleaned it with baby wipes. My toddler loves jumping on it and my baby has a safe place to try to scale the couch. Gives this mamma some ease of mind with a tile house! I would definitely buy more if I could afford it. Very colorful too!!
customer_reviews.author: Livelife7347

customer_reviews.title: nice mat
customer_reviews.text: This mat is a lot thicker and cushier than I expected for the price. It's a nice large size too. My 10 year old is enjoying cartwheels on this mat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better quality than expected.
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t expecting a really nice mat for the price, but to my surprise, it’s actuslly pretty nice. It’s thick enough for an adult to flip around with the kids on it. The kids love jumping around on it. And, it’s very light.
customer_reviews.author: Shu

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: My son is disabled. And this is the best purchase I have made so far. Its firm enough that he can practice walking and has just enough padding to keep him from serious injuries. The size is also great 1 mat is more then enough room for my toddler to roll and bounce on. My older kids love it as well. I plan on buying another one.
customer_reviews.author: Twila

customer_reviews.title: More than just a gym mat
customer_reviews.text: I have now purchased 3 of these. They are perfect for my 5 year old special needs daughter who recently learned how to sit up. We like that’s it’s soft if she tips over and how easy it is to clean, fold, and store away. We have one for home and then donated the others for use at daycare and at church. The other typical children love to play and sit on it too!
customer_reviews.author: jsjohnson

customer_reviews.title: good product, versatile and good value for the money
customer_reviews.text: we use it for our daughter's gymnastics workout. she loves it, was totally worth the purchase
customer_reviews.author: oxana

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Light and transportable with carrying handles but thick enough to perform real skills safely.
customer_reviews.author: R T Riveter

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This mat is amazing. Very thick and supportive. Good quality and product as described
customer_reviews.author: Jc

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Tumbling Mat
customer_reviews.text: My girls love this tumbling mat. It is very high quality at a great price. The mat is well padded, not flimsy, and wide enough for my 4 and 7 year olds to do cartwheels on it. I will be buying another for their playroom.
customer_reviews.author: Mom24CrazyCrossKids

customer_reviews.title: Great but watch out
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product, arrived quickly, well packaged, kid loves it for her gymnastics training at home but on day two we noticed the center mat stitching is coming undone😢. If it wasn’t for the stitching we would 5 star this all day!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua D White

customer_reviews.title: They love it!
customer_reviews.text: Score for the grandparent. Perfect think outside of the box gift for granddaughters that have everything. Arrived on time and in great shape. Not too heavy and fits under the bed.
customer_reviews.author: catrina lewis

customer_reviews.title: Good customer service
customer_reviews.text: One of the two we ordered arrived damaged from shipping. The customer service was phenomenal and were quick to respond to correct the issue. The strap on our second mat came out of the stitching pretty quickly but otherwise is totally usable. Our kids were ecstatic. I think these mats will see a lot of use.
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Great for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: This works great for my toddler. He loves it and is able to run and play in our living room safely
customer_reviews.author: Breigh Miller

customer_reviews.title: Easy to fold up and store
customer_reviews.text: Very firm, but protects kids when playing in basement on concrete. Easy to fold up and store, love the handles.Also like that it can attach to more mats in the future.
customer_reviews.author: pippi

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, folds easily, but lacks durability
customer_reviews.text: We had this for a month and the outer covering (the colored part) got a big tear near a fold. My 9 yr old daughter was the only one using it and it was on a carpeted floor, so no roughness or other objects placed on it. Very disappointed with that aspect of the mat.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah C

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This has been great for my daughter to practice her tumbling on. It seems to be ok quality. My only complaint is that the handle ripped off soon after purchasing. The rest of it has held up well though.
customer_reviews.author: mandy

customer_reviews.title: It's been a perfect mat for her tumbling
customer_reviews.text: My daughter who is using that may is 9 years old. It's been a perfect mat for her tumbling. We are buying another to give her a little more room. I wished we bought this years ago!
customer_reviews.author: bunbun

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: Nice mat at a good price. My daughter uses it to practice her tumbling. Its easy to fold and store away under the bed.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Rheaume

customer_reviews.title: this mat was very well priced and is a great mat! its soft and firm at the same ...
customer_reviews.text: this mat was very well priced and is a great mat! its soft and firm at the same time, plus it had no odor at all. in all, i love this mat and think it is a great product. My daughter wrote this review. We have waited awhile to decide on a gym mat and we are very pleased with our choice.
customer_reviews.author: Diane M Pedrosa

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality.
customer_reviews.text: The quality for the price is impressive. I purchased this because my almost 12 month old still wasn't crawling and I started to wonder if he just didn't like the carpet. I'm not sure if it was just a coincidence, but he started crawling just days after receiving this and now he's all over the place so I'm not sure I really need this anymore, but I'm sure we'll use it down the line for gymnastics or even for sleepovers.
customer_reviews.author: LS

customer_reviews.title: Love the colors and worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Perfect to put a balance beam on for safety love the colors
customer_reviews.author: Michele curtsinger

customer_reviews.title: Very Durable
customer_reviews.text: These mats are very durable and easy to fold and store
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids
customer_reviews.text: I put two of these together in my unfinished basement to make a safe area for my 3-year-old. The velcro on the sides holds multiple sheets together very well. The padding is high-density and does a great job turning concrete floor into a safe zone.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Golom

customer_reviews.title: Just like in class
customer_reviews.text: Got this so my kids could practice tumbling and wrestling moves safely at home. This mat is just like they use in tumbling class and let's them know how much space they can move safely in. We love it.
customer_reviews.author: Randi Leonard

customer_reviews.title: Baby Encouragement!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter. Her 9 month old wasn't crawling and seemed to be skipping this stage. I understand this is common but it still surprised us. We discovered it was due to their having hardwood floors. We purchased this to encourage all stages and my daughter and granddaughter love it! It also arrived about a week before the expected arrival date and that is something in itself! Well priced as well.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia J.

customer_reviews.title: Best mat ever
customer_reviews.text: Holy moly! It’s great quality and exceptionally big! Makes exercising super fun
customer_reviews.author: Skinguru

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again!!! Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Yes yes yes!!! This thing is official. Same mat they had at my daughter's gymnastics class. Easily folds for storage. Protects my little one while she tumbles around! Great purchase and great price!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Could be better made
customer_reviews.text: Thick foam, safe for gymnastics. Comes apart at the seams soon after purchase
customer_reviews.author: Bubba

customer_reviews.title: Thick mat
customer_reviews.text: Perfect mat to use for gymnastics, thick and durable, easy to fold and store.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great item, quality and thickness
customer_reviews.text: My kids use it for gymnastics and dance and love it.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: We LOVE this mat
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE this mat. My daughter adores it. We've had it a couple months and it gets regular use and still looks new! Such a good investment and I couldn't believe how great it is since it's so reasonably priced!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Ulish

customer_reviews.title: Best ever!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it and the price was great! Very supportive and soft mat for landing and falling! Perfect size. I guarantee this is the same or better then the more expensive ones! Love love love
customer_reviews.author: shauna

customer_reviews.title: Kids like them.
customer_reviews.text: The mats are firm and durable at first inspection. Great for tumbling, not so great to sleep on-FYI. My daughters can do cartwheels for days, so this is great.
customer_reviews.author: Travis the consumer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is in beginners gymnastics. She loves using the mat at home, and I like that it can fold up!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany J Chesna

customer_reviews.title: Great Mat
customer_reviews.text: Quality product. I jhave not noticed any odor that some reviewers have indicated. The handles are made where when folded you can easily carry. We already had a smaller 4-panel mat, but it does not fold properly to carry by handle and had a much higher price than this mat. Would definitely buy this mat and from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: jd35lr

customer_reviews.title: Item recieved as descibed
customer_reviews.text: Bought if for our daughter's gymnastic so she can practice at home and works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Safe and fun!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for our kids to practice at home safely. Quality so far is great, it looks like new even with them dragging it all over the house. They not only use it as a mat for tumbling and such but also as walls, forts, tents, and anything else their imaginations can come up with. The only slight downside is that this will slip on hard surfaces so just be aware. You can get a non slip rug pad if this is an issue.
customer_reviews.author: stephanietweiss

customer_reviews.title: Best Present Ever
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter loves gymnastics but is not currently in any programs. We wanted to encourage her love for the activity and this was a great find! She uses it everyday and has taught herself how do do so many things. We love how it folds up to be stored and light weight so she can get it out whenever she wants. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amy H

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: Great size and quality...after the first one came in...I ordered another one to conntect and larger perimeter...and good for adults too
customer_reviews.author: epsa317

customer_reviews.title: Stitching tore, or it would be great.
customer_reviews.text: I loved this mat - but the stitching tore within a month, and now it’s completely separating at the middle - we got late March, and it’s early June, barely over 2 months!! I’m going to have to duct tape it together, and for the price - that’s extremely frustrating. If it weren’t for this, it would be 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: tlr829

customer_reviews.title: The surface vinyl is too thin!
customer_reviews.text: Would be perfect if the skin is thicker and more durable. Also you won’t be able to clean the surface ink.
customer_reviews.author: Zhen Dong Jiang

customer_reviews.title: Great mat
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mat for my daughter stretching classes. Really enjoy the padding. It's really easy to fold, take a minute.
customer_reviews.author: Tamila Leychkis

customer_reviews.title: Great mat!
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed by this mat. The quality is fantastic. Great item for the price. Highly recommend. My only complaint is that I paid for shipping and it's now being offered with free shipping, just about a week after I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Sullivan

product_meta.title: BestMassage Gymnastics Mats Exercise Mat Tumbling Mats for Gymnastics Gymnastics Mats for Home Yoga Mat Exercise Pad Lightweight Gymnastics Panel Mat for Home Gym Mat
feature_bullets: YOUR NEXT EXERCISE PARTNER - This tri-fold gymnastics mat is perfect, not just for gymnastics, but for a variety of different exercises. From yoga to pilates, to wrestling to martial arts, daycare activities and camping trips, you can do it all on one mat.
STURDY AND DURABLE - Made of 2” thick high-density EPE, our mat is soft but durable, providing a comfortable experience that lasts.
EASY TO CLEAN - Covered in high-quality PU leather, this mat wipes down quickly and easily so you can spend less time cleaning and more time exercising.
LIGHTWEIGHT AND PORTABLE - Our mat comes equipped with handles and folds easily for convenient transport, so you can carry the gym wherever you go, or store your mat in compact places.
SUITABLE FOR MANY SPORT - Perfect for school gyms, clubs, camps, teams, daycare centers, individuals, and families.
